name: Montezuma's Revenge NES + Reboot
description:
Jump over that Skull!

Grab that Key!

Find the coveted torch!

This is the official NES version of the classic 8-bit game Montezuma's Revenge!  This NES Montezuma's Revenge Digital Package was originally part of the Kickstarter offering.  The popular Mesen emulator is included.

It also includes the full Windows reboot! Lots of digital extras too!
